      Strategy patternμ κµ¬μ΅°

      • μ „λµ μΈν„°νμ΄μ¤ : λ¨λ“  μ „λµ κµ¬ν„μ²΄μ— λ€ν• κ³µμ© μΈν„°νμ΄μ¤
      • μ»¨ν…μ¤νΈ : μ•κ³ λ¦¬μ¦μ„ μ‹¤ν–‰ν•  λ•, ν•΄λ‹Ή μ•κ³ λ¦¬μ¦κ³Ό μ—°κ²°λ μ „λµ κ°μ²΄μ λ©”μ†λ“ νΈμ¶
      • ν΄λΌμ΄μ–ΈνΈ : νΉμ • μ „λµ κ°μ²΄λ¥Ό μ»¨ν…μ¤νΈμ— μ „λ‹¬ ν•¨μΌλ΅μ¨ μ „λµμ„ λ“±λ΅ν•κ±°λ‚ λ³€κ²½ν•μ—¬ μ „λµ μ•κ³ λ¦¬μ¦μ„ μ‹¤ν–‰ν• κ²°κ³Όλ¥Ό μ–»λ”λ‹¤.
      • μ „λµν¨ν„΄μ€ OOPμ μ§‘ν•©μ²΄ (OCP, DIP, λ‹¤ν•μ„±, μΊ΅μν™”, μ¶”μƒν™”)



      μ „λµ ν¨ν„΄ κµ¬ν„ μ½”λ“

      • λΈ”λ™ ν”„λΌμ΄λ°μ΄μ—λ” 50% ν• μΈ, μ²« λ°©λ¬Έ κ³ κ°μ€ 20%, μΌλ° λ°©λ¬Έμ€ ν• μΈ μ μ©X
      • ν• μΈμ΄λΌλ” μ•κ³ λ¦¬μ¦μ„ DiscountPolicy λΌλ” μΈν„°νμ΄μ¤λ¥Ό ν†µν•΄ λ¶„λ¦¬ν•΄μ„ κ΄€λ¦¬
      //μ „λµ μΈν„°νμ΄μ¤
public interface DiscountPolicy {
    double discount(Item item);
}

//blackFridayμ— μ μ©ν•  μ •μ±…
public class BlackFridayDiscountPolicy implements DiscountPolicy {
    @Override
    public double discount(Item item) {
        return item.getPrice() * 0.5;
    }
}

//μ•„λ¬΄ μ΄λ²¤νΈ μ—†λ” λ‚ μ— μ μ©ν•  μ •μ±…
public class CommonDiscountPolicy implements DiscountPolicy {
    @Override
    public double discount(Item item) {
        return item.getPrice();
    }
}

//μ²« λ°©λ¬Έμμ— μ μ©ν•  ν• μΈ μ •μ±…
public class FirstDiscountPolicy implements DiscountPolicy {
    @Override
    public double discountPolicy(Item item) {
        return item.getPrice() * 0.8;
    }
}

//μ»¨ν…μ¤νΈ
public class Calculator {
    private final DiscountPolicy discountPolicy;

    public Calculator(DiscountPolicy discountPolicy) {
        this.discountPolicy = discountPolicy;
    }

    public double calculate(List<Item> items) {
        double total = 0;
        for (Item item : items) {
            total += discountPolicy.discount(item);
        }
        return total;
    }
}

//ν΄λΌμ΄μ–ΈνΈ
public static void main(String[] args) {
    //μ‚¬μ©ν•λ” κ³³μ—μ„ μ „λµμ„ μ§€μ •
    Calculator cal = new Calculator(new BlackFridayDiscountPolicy());
    cal.calculate(Arrays.asList(
        new Item("banana", 3000),
        new Item("cellPhone", 1000000)
    ));
}
